examples: Among the items at the auction was an 18th-century oak coffer.
put the money in the coffer
… public coffers running dry in a bleak economy …

definition: a recessed panel in a vault, ceiling, or soffit
to store or hoard up in a coffer
to form (something, such as a ceiling) with recessed panels
examples: A ceiling that is coffered will bring an added dimension to a large room.
